translations.text: Bal matta'naa haaa'ulaaa'i Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa taala alaihimul 'umur; afalaa yarawna anna na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; afahumul ghaaliboon

translations.text: Wa-nada'ul mawaazeenal qista li-Yawmil Qiyaamati falaa tuzlamu nafsun shai'aa; Wa-in kaana misqaala habbatim min khardalin atainaa bihaa; Wa-kafaa binaa haasibeen

words.en: Those who||fear||their Lord||in the unseen||and they||of||the Hour||(are) afraid

translations.text: Allazeena yakhshawna Rabbahum bilghaibi Wa-hum minas Saa'ati mushfiqoon

words.en: And this||(is) a Reminder||blessed||which We (have) revealed||Then are you||of it||rejecters

words.en: When||he said||to his father||and his people||What||(are) these||[the] statues||which||you||to it||(are) devoted

translations.text: iz qaala li-abeehi Wa-qawmihee maa haazihit tamaaseelul lateee antum lahaa aakifoon

translations.text: Qaalooo aji'tanaa bil-haqqi am anta minal laa'ibeen

translations.text: Qaala bar Rabbukum Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardil lazee fatarahunna Wa-ana 'alaa zaalikum minash shaahideen

words.en: So he made them||(into) pieces||except||a large (one)||of them||so that they may||to it||return

words.en: They said||Who||(has) done||this||to our gods||Indeed he||(is) of||the wrongdoers

translations.text: Qaaloo man fa'ala haazaa bi-aalihatinaaa innahoo laminaz zaalimeen

words.en: Then||they were turned||on||their heads||Verily||you know||not||these||(can) speak!

words.en: And they intended||for him||a plan||but We made them||the greatest losers

translations.text: Wa-Lootan aatainaahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmanw Wa-najjainaahu minal qaryatil latee kaanat ta'malul khabaaa'is; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in faasiqeen

translations.text: Wa-adkhalnaahu fee rahmatinaa innahoo minas saaliheen

words.en: And Nuh||when||he called||before||before||so We responded||to him||and We saved him||and his family||from||the affliction||[the] great

words.en: And We helped him||from||the people||who||denied||Our Signs||Indeed they||were||a people||evil||so We drowned them||all

translations.text: Wa-nasarnaahu minal qawmil lazeena kazzaboo bi-Aayaatinaa; innahum kaanoo qawma saw'in fa-aghraq-naahum ajma'een

translations.text: Fastajabnaa lahoo fakashaf-naa maa bihee min durrinw Wa-aatainaahu ahlahoo Wa-mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan min indinaa Wa-zikraa lil'aabideen

translations.text: Wa-ismaa'eela Wa-idreesa Wa-Zal Kifli kullum minas saabireen

translations.text: Wa-adkhalnaahum fee rahmatinaa innahum minas saaliheen

translations.text: Fastajabnaa lahoo Wa-najjainaahu minal ghamm; Wa-kazaalika nunjil mu'mineen

translations.text: Fastajabnaa lahoo Wa-wahabnaa lahoo Yahyaa Wa-aslahnaa lahoo zawjah; innahum kaanoo yusaari'oona fil khairaati Wa-yad'oonanaa raghabanw Wa-rahabaa; Wa-kaanoo lanaa khaashi'een

translations.text: Wallateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehaa min roohinaa Wa-ja'alnaahaa wabnahaaa Aayatan lil'aalameen

words.id: sesungguhnya||ini||umatmu/agamamu||ummat/agama||yang satu||dan Aku||Tuhan kalian||maka sembahlah Aku

translations.text: inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw Wa-Ana Rabbukum fa'budoon

translations.text: Famaien ya'mal minas saalihaati Wa-huwa mu'minun falaa kufraana lisa'yihee Wa-innaa lahoo kaatiboon

words.id: dan haram||atas||suatu negeri||Kami telah binasakannya||karena sesungguhnya mereka||(mereka) tidak||kembali
words.en: And (there is) prohibition||upon||a city||which We have destroyed||that they||not||will return

words.en: Until||when||has been opened||(for) the Yajuj||and Majuj||and they||from||every||elevation||descend

words.en: And has approached||the promise||[the] true||then behold||[it]||(are) staring||(the) eyes||(of) those who||disbelieved||O woe to us!||Verily||we had been||in||heedlessness||of||this||nay||we were||wrongdoers

translations.text: Waqtarabal wa'dul haqqu fa-izaa hiya shaakhisatun absaarul lazeena kafaroo yaawailanaa qad kunna fee ghaflatin min haaza bal kunnaa zaalimeen

words.en: Indeed, you||and what||you worship||besides Allah||besides Allah||besides Allah||(are) firewood||(of) Hell||You||to it||will come

translations.text: innakum Wa-maa ta'budoona min doonil laahi hasabu Jahannama antum lahaa waaridoon

words.id: sekiranya||adalah||mereka itu||Tuhan||tidak||datang/memasukinya||dan tiap-tiap/semuanya||didalamnya||mereka kekal
words.en: If||were||these||gods||not||they (would) have come to it||And all||therein||will abide forever

translations.text: Law kaana haaa'ulaaa'i aalihatan maa waradoohaa Wa-kullun feehaa khaalidoon

words.id: bagi mereka||didalamnya||bernapas panjang/merintih||dan mereka||didalamnya||tidak||mereka mendengar

translations.text: Lahum feehaa zafeerunw Wa-hum feehaa laa yasma'oon

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||telah/lebih dahulu||bagi mereka||dari Kami||kebaikan||mereka itu||dari padanya||mereka dijauhkan
words.en: Indeed||those||has gone forth||for them||from Us||the good||those||from it||(will be) removed far

words.id: tidak||mereka mendengar||suara/desirnya (api neraka)||dan mereka||dalam||apa||menginginkan||diri/jiwa mereka||mereka kekal
words.en: Not||they will hear||(the) slightest sound of it||and they||in||what||desire||their souls||will abide forever

translations.text: Laa yasma'oona hasee-sahaa Wa-hum fee mash tahat anfusuhum khaalidoon

words.id: tidak||menyusahkan mereka||kejutan/kedahsyatan||yang besar||dan mendapatkan/menyambut mereka||malaikat||inilah||harimu||yang||kalian adalah||kamu dijanjikan
words.en: Not||will grieve them||the terror||[the] greatest||and will meet them||the Angels||This||(is) your Day||which||you were||promised

translations.text: Laa yahzunuhumul faza'ul akbaru Wa-tatalaq-qaahumul malaaa'ikatu haazaa Yawmukumul lazee kuntum too'adoon

words.id: pada hari||Kami lipat/gulung||langit||seperti lipatan/gulungan||daftar/lembaran kertas||untuk tulisan-tulisan||sebagaimana||Kami memulai||pertama||penciptaan||Kami mengulanginya||suatu janji||atas Kami/pasti Kami||sesungguhnya Kami||adalah Kami||berbuat/melaksanakan
words.en: (The) Day||We will fold||the heaven||like (the) folding||(of) a scroll||for records||As||We began||(the) first||creation||We will repeat it||a promise||upon Us||Indeed We||We are||(the) Doers

translations.text: Yawma natwis samaaa'a kataiyis sijilli lilkutub; kamaa bada'naa awwala khalqin nu'eeduh; wa'dan alainaa; innaa kunna faa'ileen

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||telah Kami tuliskan||didalam||Zabur||dari||sesudah||peringatan (Lauhul Mahfuz)||bahwasanya||bumi||mewarisinya||hamba-hamba-Ku||orang-orang yang saleh
words.en: And verily||We have written||in||the Scripture||after||after||the mention||that||the earth||will inherit it||My slaves||the righteous

translations.text: Wa-laqad katabnaa fiz Zaboori min ba'diz zikri annal arda yarisuhaa ibaadi-yas saalihoon

words.id: sesungguhnya||didalam||ini||adalah penyampaian/penjelasan||bagi kaum||orang-orang yang menyembah
words.en: Indeed||in||this||surely is a Message||for a people||worshippers

translations.text: inna fee haaza labalaa-ghal liqawmin aabideen

words.id: dan tidak||Kami mengutus kamu||melainkan||rahmat||bagi semesta alam
words.en: And not||We have sent you||but||(as) a mercy||for the worlds

translations.text: Wa-maaa arsalnaaka illaa rahmatal lil'aalameen

words.id: katakanlah||sesungguhnya hanyalah||diwahyukan||kepadaku||sesungguhnya hanyalah||Tuhanmu||Tuhan||satu/Esa||maka apakah||kamu||berserah diri
words.en: Say||Only||it is revealed||to me||that||your god||(is) God||One||so will||you||submit (to Him)

translations.text: Qul innamaa yoohaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum illaahunw Waahid, fahal antum muslimoon

words.id: maka jika||mereka berpaling||maka katakanlah||aku telah memaklumkan kepadamu||atas||yang sama/terus-terang||dan aku||tidak mengetahui||apakah dekat||atau||jauh||apa||kamu diancam/diancamkan kepadamu
words.en: But if||they turn away||then say||I (have) announced to you||equally||equally||And not||I know||whether is near||or||far||what||you are promised

translations.text: Fa-in tawallaw faqul aazantukum 'alaa sawaaa'; Wa-in adreee aqareebun am ba'eedun maa too'adoon

words.id: sesungguhnya Dia||Dia mengetahui||keras/terus terang||dari||perkataan||dan Dia mengetahui||apa||kamu sembunyikan/rahasiakan
words.en: Indeed He||knows||the declared||[of]||[the] speech||and He knows||what||you conceal

translations.text: innahoo ya'lamul jahra minal qawli Wa-ya'lamu maa taktumoon

words.id: dan jika/tidak||aku mengetahui||boleh jadi ia/hal itu||fitnah/cobaan||bagi kalian||dan kesenangan||sampai||waktu tertentu
words.en: And not||I know||perhaps it may be||a trial||for you||and an enjoyment||for||a time

translations.text: Wa-in adree la'allahoo fitnatul lakum Wa-mataa'un ilaa heen

words.id: (Muhammad) berkata||ya Tuhanku||berilah keputusan||dengan benar||dan Tuhan kami||Maha Pengasih||tempat dimintai pertolongan||atas||apa||kamu sifatkan/katakan
words.en: He said||My Lord!||judge||in truth||And our Lord||(is) the Most Gracious||the One Whose help is sought||against||what||you attribute

translations.text: Qaala Rabbih kum bil-haqq; Wa-Rabbunar Rahmaa-nul musta'aanu 'alaa maa tasifoon
